briefTitle: A Comparative Study of BAT1706 and EU Avastin® in Patients With Advanced Non Squamous Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double Blind, Phase III Study of BAT1706 Versus EU Avastin® Plus Chemotherapy in Patients With Advanced Non Squamous Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
summary: This is a Phase III, randomized, double blind, multicenter, active comparator, parallel two arm study to compare the efficacy, and to evaluate the safety, and immunogenicity of BAT1706 to EU Avastin® in patients with previously untreated advanced non-squamous non-small cell lung cancer (nsNSCLC) to demonstrate clinical equivalence of BAT1706 and EU Avastin®.

commonTop: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (inclcysts and polyps)
